V hJMilitary Secret. 1073c^)\ ]Trom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, m/j . '6rd September 1919.rG^^ (Received 6th.)fjcn A.V.1"12018. 3rd September. Malleson wires 1st SeptemberBokhara. Under Bolshevic auspices a ' Bokahara Mahometan Soviet' has been established in Kagen. As that place is in Bolshevic military occupation Amir can take (corrupt group) direct measures. Meanwhile, country continues (corrupt group) in danger of (corrupt group) s. Mullas of Bokhara declare they would sooner see Bokhara heap of ruins than give countenance to Bolshevic doctrines."
